titleStmt.title: Some profitable directions both for priest & people in two sermons preached before these evil times : the one to the clergy, the other to the citizens of London / by H. Hammond.
titleStmt.author: Hammond, Henry, 1605-1660.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by J.F. for R. Royston ...,

notesStmt.note: Page 58 has print faded with some loss of text in filmed copy. Pages 50-67 photographed from University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library copy and inserted at end.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
The pastor's motto -- The poor mans tithing.
